name: Seeker (itch) (Vadom)
description:
Follow Bahith a Seeker in Neo-Egypt, in the last moments of the Sura Shaitan case.

This Project was made to test my skills and was completed in 10 hours, Due to this there are many issues that I know are there.

This was a tough learning experience which I would like to try again someday.

Credits to FrostyZ as the voice of Bahith.

Also Headphone warning, unfortunately I didn't have enough time to make a volume controller. Also controls are WASD, Mouse and Left Mouse Button.
